definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: So an ABR by definition is a member of two or more areas.
sentences.chinese: 區域邊界路由器是兩個或者多個區域的成員。

sentences.english: The router's role is then to move traffic between the VLANs.
sentences.chinese: 這時，路由器的作用就是在VLAN之間傳遞流量。

sentences.english: Conception client software resides "on" the router, and a camera.
sentences.chinese: 動態域名客戶端軟件駐留在一個路由器，攝像頭。

sentences.english: We have a Cisco E300 router as well.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個路由器，以及思科的e300。

sentences.english: The connection could not be disconnected because it was created by the multi-protocol router.
sentences.chinese: 通訊不能被斷開，因爲該通訊被多協議路由器完成。

sentences.english: Study of the difference between three-ply switches and routers.
sentences.chinese: 研究三層交換機與路由器之間的區別。

sentences.english: Press to get to the router prompt.
sentences.chinese: 按下回車鍵進入路由器提示符狀態。

sentences.english: Some defined set of criteria determines where a router sends the message.
sentences.chinese: 某些既定的標準決定路由器將把信息發送到哪裏。

sentences.english: But the high price of it makes a lot of demanders hang back.
sentences.chinese: 然而路由器的高昂價格卻令許多需求者望而卻步。

sentences.english: So, you're afraid you've bricked your router.
sentences.chinese: 所以，你害怕你已經用磚頭封你的路由器。

sentences.english: This page will explain how routers communicate in an OSPF network.
sentences.chinese: 本頁將解釋路由器如何在OSPF網路內通訊。

sentences.english: Dynamic routing uses broadcasts and multicasts to communicate with other routers.
sentences.chinese: 動態路由使用廣播和多點傳播來和其他路由器通訊。

sentences.english: How Does a Router Respond to BIP Errors?
sentences.chinese: 路由器是如何響應的BIP錯誤？

sentences.english: In broadcast multi-access networks there may be more than two routers.
sentences.chinese: 在廣播多重存取網路可能有二顆以上的路由器。

sentences.english: I work in H&Q Group, I am like router and switch product.
sentences.chinese: 我漢鼎集團工作，我很喜歡路由器和交換機產品。

sentences.english: SNMP agent is an integrated part of router software system .
sentences.chinese: 路由器網管代理是路由器軟件系統的重要組成部分。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
